function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Inadequate recognition of at-risk groups by local authorities increases the vulnerability of these populations to contagious diseases.","category":"Person","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Misinformation and job precarity leading to challenges","category":"Person","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of public acceptance of social distancing measures","category":"Person","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ineffective implementation of multiple layers of social distancing","category":"Person","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of adherence to social distancing measures","category":"Person","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of community engagement in containment strategy","category":"Participation","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Scientific uncertainties about covid-19","category":"Leadership","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate public healthcare infrastructure in india to support herd immunity strategy","category":"Capacity Development","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inefficient tracing of infection cases in india","category":"Leadership","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Dependency on mass testing as the primary strategy may lead to complacency in implementing other necessary measures such as social distancing and contact tracing.","category":"Leadership","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Relying solely on mass testing without proper training and resources for healthcare workers may result in inefficiency and errors in testing processes.","category":"Leadership","confidence":"High"},{"name":"The cost of widespread testing may limit access for certain populations, leading to disparities in healthcare and potential underreporting of cases.","category":"Accountability","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliance on herd immunity as a mitigation strategy for covid-19","category":"Leadership","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Risk of covid-19 transmission in the built environment due to lack of mitigation measures and tools.","category":"Organizations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Development of digital contact tracing applications without thorough regulatory process can lead to privacy violations and data security risks.","category":"Laws&Regulations","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Risk of sars-cov-2 transmission in food industries due to lack of proper disinfection exposure.","category":"Business","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Nurses experiencing extreme workload and mental health challenges due to covid-19 documentation.","category":"Business","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Automobile sector sales plummeting and production delays due to covid-19
